#summary Introduction to the Facebook.NET IFrame Controls Add-On
#labels Featured
= Introduction =

The Facebook.NET Controls Add-On is meant to serve as a series of custom server controls for IFrame Facebook applications developed using Nikhil Kothari's Facebook.NET wrapper for ASP.NET.


= Details =

Currently we have implemented the following controls:
  * The relative time difference control (event X occurred 8 hours ago)
  * The Facebook user card control (creates a "baseball card" of a user)
